reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress comfortable, well-fitting, and appreciate its flattering ruching that accentuates curves.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gorgeous, Classy, Sexy!
items.body: Needed a dress for a winter wedding, and felt my existing wardrobe bare-armed choices would all leave me a bit chilly… so I started shopping around. Everything I found in stores was either a) wayyyy too short - I’ve got a great pair of legs but I’m 5’11” and almost 50 and really want to be able to sit down without showing everyone my nether region; b) granny type dresses that look like I’m heading back to the home after the wedding, or c) outrageously priced - I’m all about investing in classic pieces but there’s only so many cocktail dresses I need at this point and Id rather use the $ to buy the couple a nice gift. So, I came searching on Amazon, and found several sellers offering a similar style dress. I purchased two from two different sellers and the Merokeety was by far and away the loveliest choice. I am 5’11” and 142 lbs, so tall and on the thinner side. I ordered a small which is my normal size. The dress is true to size. A small fit me snuggly in that it highlights my curves and is form fitting, but the material is forgiving and stretchy. Love the fit and felt it was so much nicer in the merokeety branded dress. Most dresses are pretty short on me but this dress hits me at just about the knee - so I can dance and move around and not worry about flashing anyone. Also doesn’t seem to be the kind of dress/material that rides up on the legs a lot so I don’t think I’ll be adjusting my skirt all night. It’s not the most expensive feeling material but it doesn’t look cheap or poorly made at all. I love that the Merokeety dress has a zipper up the back as well - it just feels more properly fitted and higher end because of it. The color I ordered was a pretty wine red, a very pretty and a rich, deep color. Overall it’s an attractive dress and I feel sexy in it even if it’s not the sexiest dress on the planet by itself… it’s what I would call sophisticated sexy if that’s a thing. Sort of like what I would picture silver screen sirens wearing - it kind of reminds me of something I’ve seen Sophia Loren in, actually. The only con? The sleeves are a tad short for me, but I have long arms so that’s expected. I like the way the dress looks with the sleeves falling off the shoulder which resolves my issue with sleeve length completely. Overall, very pleased with this dress and highly recommend! Read more
items.author: AE

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Elegant and Flattering – Perfect for a Night Out
items.body: I absolutely love this dress! The royal color is stunning, and the square neckline paired with the ruched design creates a flattering, elegant silhouette. The long balloon sleeves add a stylish and unique touch that really sets this dress apart from typical party dresses. It fits beautifully, hugs all the right places without feeling uncomfortable, and makes me feel confident and put-together whenever I wear it. The material is soft yet structured enough to hold its shape, making it ideal for clubwear, parties, or any special occasion. If you’re looking for a dress that combines elegance, style, and comfort, this is a fantastic choice. I love wearing it and have already received compliments when I’ve worn it out. It's not super thick nor see-through, and somewhat warm. Read more
items.author: Michelle Kim

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Ruching Reigns
items.body: Love the dress. I probably could have gotten a large as it gaps in back. For reference I’m 5’9 and about 190. With shapewear it is stunning and super comfortable. Could go without shapewear as well since ruching forgives a host of sins. Color is beautiful. Will need to steam before wearing as sleeves are wrinkled. Buy it! Read more
items.author: K

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars True to size
items.body: Beautiful well made dress fit perfectly to size and was very comfortable. The length was perfect Read more
items.author: Debbie Readling

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Flattering dress for a special occasion!
items.body: I needed a dress for a fall wedding and had ordered several others first but found this one to be the best. I wanted something simple but figure flattering and this fit the bill! The ruched fabric is very forgiving and the sleeves and neckline add a nice flare. The color and sizing was accurate as advertised on the website (I am 5’2”, 140lbs so I ordered a medium which fit perfectly. It can easily be paired with dress shoes or sandals but it looks equally good with dress boots which I am wearing since it is a fall wedding. I highly recommend this dress! Read more
items.author: Katy

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Love it, but had to leave it
items.body: The dress did not fit as I expected it to do so. I ordered the dress in two different colors because I like the way it looked, but after I tried on one of them and had a hard time getting it on, I had to give up I'M more of a curvy girl ( 5'2 tall and weight 170 lbs) and it's just not made for someone with my figure. It's a beautiful dress. The materials used were phenomenal. I just wish you had something for curry girls. Read more
items.author: Dede

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love the dress
items.body: Fit great, it was everything I needed it to be! I got the dress cause I saw the reviews of other pregnant women wearing!! Quality was low but was expected with the price. Quality wasn’t bad enough that it looks bad but materials felt cheap. This aside the dress was still everything I wanted it to be I think what you get for the price is understandable. Read more
items.author: Taylor Skomp

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pretty dress. Flattering/great on the curves
items.body: This dress is soft and very clingy, but in a very flattering way. As a middle age woman experiencing extra pounds around the middle thanks to peri menopause - I am very appreciative of the ruching. I wanted something that would be formfitting, but not emphasize cellulite on my butt or my thighs plus no need to highlight the pooch or the stomach. There is a weird extra amount of fabric around the zipper though. You have to either tug it down or tug it up to make it not bunch up on the backside. I liked the dress enough that I don't care. I will deal with that. I think it is actually due to extra materials so that it works with your size. So someone who buys the same size dress, but has differently placed curves than me might appreciate the extra fabric there. The sleeves are see-through and beautiful, and I love the neckline. I bought the black and it is not see-through, but I cannot speak to the other colors. The material is not very thick. If you have curves, it will like this. In case it helps someone my measurements are 36DD, 5'6, 150lbs and waist 29. Read more
items.author: Krissy

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Cocktail Bodycon Ruched Formal is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Cocktail Bodycon Ruched Formal is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Apricot, Black, Orange, Dark Green, Light Blue, Red, Royal, Plum, Wine Red, Pink, White, Fluo Pink, Teal. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
